name: Heroside 4
description:
Story: its been a few months after the events of Heroside 3 and Avery is having a few nightmares, while out on a walk she gets another call from the warrior 7 about the scythe clan, but this time....things get alot more tense...

_________________________________________________________________________

the game will be released on september 20th. 2022 as of right now, hope you enjoy the game :)

gameplay is pretty much like the other games. arrow keys to move left to right up to jump, q and e to swap character, and ctrl to attack.
